title: 820-01958 MacBook Air 2020 A2179 stalls during startup
message:
This board is showing 20V USB-C, PPBUS_G3H 12.6V, PPVCC_NAND_SSD0 2.5V. It displays the Apple logo but then goes into super-sluggish mode, with the cursor responding in a delayed and extremely slow fashion. Fan is blowing high. It stalls during startup and I can't even launch Internet Recovery.

No obvious liquid damage. I successfully performed a DFU Restore but it still stalls indefinitely during startup. I have also tried a known-good battery and an SMC reset. Any ideas as for what else to check on this board?

title: 820-01958 MacBook Air 2020 A2179 stalls during startup
message:
Fan spins high if there is a thermal issue.
Check first with external monitor, disconnecting internal LCD (J8500).
May need to test with known good trackpad flex/board also.

title: 820-01958 MacBook Air 2020 A2179 stalls during startup
message: Found a CPU fault; no need to work on this any further.

title: 820-01958 MacBook Air 2020 A2179 stalls during startup
message: what fault did you find exactly?
